alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wood and southwestern Lucas Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 813 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mcclure, or 10 miles east of Napoleon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Perrysburg, Rossford, Waterville, Whitehouse, Weston, Maumee, Pemberville, Millbury, Haskins, Luckey, Bradner, Grand Rapids, Wayne, Risingsun, Cygnet, Portage, Jerry City, Tontogany and Custar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
